products.name: Savings Account
products.description: A basic account for storing money and earning interest

products.name: Checking Account
products.description: An account for daily transactions and bill payments

products.name: Certificate of Deposit (CD)
products.description: A savings account with a fixed term and typically higher interest rate

products.name: Money Market Account
products.description: A high-yield savings account with check-writing privileges

products.name: Personal Loan
products.description: Unsecured loan for personal use with fixed repayment terms

products.name: Mortgage
products.description: Long-term loan for purchasing a home or property

products.name: Home Equity Line of Credit (HELOC)
products.description: A revolving credit line secured by your home's equity

products.name: Credit Card
products.description: A revolving line of credit for purchases and cash advances

products.name: Individual Retirement Account (IRA)
products.description: A tax-advantaged account for retirement savings

products.name: Business Checking Account
products.description: A checking account designed for business transactions

products.name: Foreign Currency Exchange
products.description: Service for exchanging one currency for another
